address1: KILOMETRO 7 AUTOPISTA MEDELLIN PARQUE INDUSTRIAL CELTA TRADE PARK LOTE 155 BODEGA 4, FUNZA

partnerDetails.about:
We provide and develop engineering products and solutions for motor control and protection, as well as supply of electrical panels of high specification. We also supply equipment, components and software to automation and medium and low voltage companies.

SOLUTIONS and SERVICES offered:
  • SMART-ING Projects - It is responsible for the development of applications in multidisciplinary systems, which include electronic equipment, communications and software.
  • RED AUTOMATION MASTER - Network of integrators and OEMs, which seeks to create long-term relationships with companies that provide the industrial automation service, with the aim of providing them with equipment, components and software.
  • SMART MOTORS - We provide and develop products and engineering solutions for application in electric motors, speed variation, motion control and protection. 
  • SMART-ING ACADEMY - We manage knowledge in the electrical, electronic, mechanical, communications and applied software areas.
